name: Devastablance
description: The world, once in balance between spiritual and material realities, has collapsed into the abyss of war. In a fit of anger, people used the most terrible creation of material reality. Due to the greed of the lords of spiritual reality, nuclear bombs hit not only the abode of spirituality, but also the material territory. Being the head of the scavengers association, which tries to reverse the consequences of the terrible mistakes of its ancestors, desperately trying to restore the balance of material and spiritual realities. Devastablance is a game in which you will have to play as the leader of a group of 'Scavengers' who are in great danger. Gather an army and get new allies in the game. Fight zombies, search for people and objects, ride a car, go through platformers, all this and much more you will see in this game! Go through the plot, save the scavengers, or doom them to death, everything is in your hands! Rather, immerse yourself in the world of destroyed balance.
